description.name: 555 Mission St
description.location: Western side of Building, street level.
description.source: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
description.description: This large plaza has several art and landscaping features. It is located in front of 555 Mission Streets and runs along the west side of the building. There are several distinct sitting areas with different styles of seating.

description.name: Foundry Square NE
description.location: corner of 1st and howard
description.source: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
description.description: This is one of three plazas fronting the intersection of 1st and Howard, forming Foundary Square. It features art sculptures and seating near a cafe.

description.name: Foundry Square SE
description.location: corner of first and howard
description.source: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
description.description: This is one of three plazas on the 1st and Howard intersection, forming Foundry Square. This space features a sculpture, landscape, and seating near food services.

description.name: Foundry Square NW
description.location: corner of first and howard
description.source: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
description.description: This is one of three plazas on the 1st and Howard intersection, forming Foundry Square. This space features a sculpture, landscape, and seating near food services.

description.name: Intercontinental Hotel_Bay Terrace
description.restrooms: Hotel. Could use the lobby restrooms
description.location: 6th floor, entrance next to elevator bay
description.source: DT Plan 2009, POPOS Mailing List
description.description: The Intercontinental Hotel provides two POPOS on the fourth and sixth floors. They have various seating arrangements and landscaping, each with views of the City.

description.name: Intercontinental Hotel_Pacific Terrace
description.restrooms: Hotel. Could use the lobby restrooms etc
description.location: 4th floor, turn left from elevator bay, walk beyond convention/meeting rooms, turn left
description.source: DT Plan 2009, POPOS Mailing List
description.description: The Intercontinental Hotel provides two POPOS on the fourth and sixth floors. They have various seating arrangements and landscaping, each with views of the City.

description.name: 235 Second St
description.landscaping: bamboo, street trees. Indoor park has bushes.
description.accessibility: Direct for plaza. Indirect for indoor park
description.location: urban garden: corner of second and clementina, indoor park ground floor.
description.source: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
description.description: This plaza is located on the corner of 2nd St. and Clementina St. It features several types of seating, served by a cafe.

description.name: 560 Mission St
description.location: Plaza: NE side of building; indoor park/arcade along anthony st.
description.source: SPUR, DT Plan 2009
description.description: This large plaza features a sculpture in a pool of water, a large bamboo grove, and various forms of seating. It is served by a cafe.

description.name: Marriott Courtyard - A (Starbucks)
description.landscaping: Street trees, planters with bushes, flowers
description.location: Bench next to entrance setback 15 feet on 2nd Street.  Per Thayer:  Benches on sidewalk setback on Folsom.
description.source: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
description.description: Thayer referenced something that is not part of the open space requirement, this is pedestrian improvement requirement.  Per Thayer:  This open space has benches and landscaping along the sidewalk on Folsom at street level.

description.name: Marriott Courtyard - B (Starbucks)
description.landscaping: Street trees, planters with bushes, flowers
description.location: Snippet below grade with stair entry on corner of 2nd & Folsom and wheelchair entry on Folsom.
description.source: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
description.description: This open space has a small sitting space below street level on the corner of Folsom and Second, served by a café.

description.name: Marriott Courtyard - C
description.type: Interior courtyard area - does not appear to be public (see notes)
description.location: inside the hotel courtyard.
description.source: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
description.description: This space features extensive landscaping with several art attractions. Comfortable seating arrangements are located throughout the space. Food service nearby inside the hotel.

description.name: 101 2nd St
description.location: Ground/Mezz level at 2nd/mission
description.source: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
description.description: This greenhouse features large trees, windows, and art. It has two levels of space and is served by a cafe.

description.name: 199 Fremont St
description.location: On the howard street frontage
description.source: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
description.description: This large plaza space features extensive rock landscaping and artwork. There are two adjoined areas, one of which has food service.

description.name: 343 Sansome St
description.location: 14th floor terrace, and on top of the "old office tower" (could be one and the same). Also behind the building leisendorf street, the street is closed during lunch hours, as was proposed and subsequently permitted.
description.source: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
description.description: This fifteenth floor open space has excellent views of surrounding buildings and streets, as well as the San Francisco Bay. It has various types of seating and landscaping. It also has art in the form of a large sundial.

description.name: Empire Park
description.landscaping: Water fountain and lots of plants and shade.
description.location: Along commercial street and at 642 commercial st
description.source: SPUR, DT Plan 2009
description.description: Empire park, located at 642 Commercial, is an urban garden that features a water fountain and landscaping. Along Commercial in front of Empire park, there are many widened sidewalk spaces which have benches and landscaping.

description.name: 100 California St
description.location: "ground level exterior open space in the form of plazas and walkways"
description.source: POPOS Mailing List
description.description: This is a large plaza with planter boxes, along with smaller spaces along Davis Street. There is also space for food service to serve the plaza in the future.

description.name: Commercial Street (235 Pine Entitlement)
description.type: lunchtime conversion. Commission was satisfied that it met the guidelins.
description.location: commercial street between montgomery and sansome
description.source: POPOS Mailing List
description.description: Linear park improvements along Commercial Street feature various types of trees and concrete linear seating. These spaces are served by many cafés and restaurants along Commercial Street. Additional seating is provided during lunch hours.

description.name: 120 Howard St
description.location: interior courtyard between the building and the building adjacent to the east
description.source: POPOS Mailing List
description.description: This space features plants along the entirety of the snippet and is served by an espresso cart.

description.name: 1 Kearny St
description.landscaping: Hedges and other types of plants.
description.location: Rooftop (11th floor)
description.source: POPOS Mailing List
description.description: This rooftop terrace has extensive views of Market St. as well as rooftop architecture of nearby buildings. Landscaping and bench seating support this space.

description.name: 55 Second St - A
description.restrooms: Located in hallway between lobby and indoor park
description.location: Located inside the historic building, up a set of 3-4 stairs. Can be accessed through the main lobby (walk past the elevator bay) and through entrances from Jessie and Stevenson Streets.
description.source: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
description.description: This large, indoor "park" located inside the historia building has a wooden floor, tables with chairs, and large, comfortable leather chairs on a carpeted section near the large window looking out on Stevenson Street.

description.name: 55 Second St - B
description.restrooms: Located in hallway between lobby and indoor park
description.location: The urban garden is at the end of anthony street, at the Jessie Street entrance to the building
description.source: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
description.description: This space is located outside the rear entry of 55 Second Street. It has planter boxes that serve as seating throughout the plaza.

description.name: 55 Second St - C
description.source: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List

description.name: Millenium Tower Plaza
description.accessibility: Indirect for Atrium. Unknown for Plaza
description.location: Ground level.
description.source: POPOS Mailing List
description.description: This atrium features extensive artwork and is served by a bar/restaurant on the premises. It has various types of seating with tables, and high windows overhead.

description.name: 77 Van Ness Ave
description.location: Inside the lobby
description.source: POPOS Mailing List
description.description: This space is in the front lobby of 77 Van Ness. It has tables and chairs and features a sculpture.

description.name: 345 California St - A
description.location: Plaza in front of building main entrance.
description.source: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
description.description: This open space is provided in the form of a large plaza fronting California Street. Additionally, two snippets can be found on the west and east sides of the building, connected by an interior walkway. The plaza and east snippet are served by restaurant

description.name: 345 California St - East B
description.location: Two snippets on either side of building main entrance, connected by walkway.
description.source: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
description.description: Two snippets can be found on the west and east sides of the building, connected by an interior walkway. The west snippet can be entered from Sansome Street, next to the Mandarin Hotel. There is a bench and bamboo in planters. The east snippet is on the B

description.name: 345 California St - West C
description.location: Two snippets on either side of building main entrance, connected by walkway.
description.source: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
description.description: Two snippets can be found on the west and east sides of the building, connected by an interior walkway. The west snippet can be entered from Sansome Street, next to the Mandarin Hotel. There is a bench and bamboo in planters. The east snippet is on the B

description.name: Embarcadero Center West 1, 2, & 3
description.type: Pedestrian walkway on ground and 2nd levels
description.location: Commercial Street between Drumm and Sansome
description.source: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List, Motion
description.description: Commercial Street throughout Embarcadero 1, 2, and 3 is a pedestrian mall on ground floor and 2nd level, which is accessed by an elaborate staircase system, flanked by waterfalls. Fountains, foliage, art work, and bench seating found throughout.

description.name: Rincon Center
description.location: in the courtyard between 1 and 2 rincon center
description.source: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
description.description: This large plaza space is found in the interior courtyard between Rincon Center 1 and Rincon Center 2. It features several art sculptures and different types of seating.

description.name: 123 Mission St
description.location: plaza in front of the building
description.source: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
description.description: This large plaza features extensive landscaping and art. Seperate seating areas with seating characterize the area.

description.name: 150 California St
description.location: 6th Floor
description.source: SPUR, DT Plan 2009
description.description: This view terrace is located six stories above the street level. There is a large sculpture, long periods of sunlight, and several types of seating. There are extensive views of the surrounding area.

description.name: 600 California St
description.location: Northwest side of building, up the stairs from California Street beyond an artistic gateway.
description.source: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
description.description: A shady open space area with art in the form of sculptures. This snippet found on the northwest side of the building, up the stairs. It adjoins the open space of the adjacent building.

description.name: Westfield Sky Terrace (Wesfield Center Mall)
description.location: Roof top, 9th floor. Accessible by elevator in 835 Market St (only 1st elevator goes to 9th floor).
description.source: DT Plan 2009, POPOS Mailing List
description.description: This extensive 9th floor rooftop space looks onto the dome of the mall and has views westward and sunlight. It does not have direct food service, but food may be found in the food court below in the mall.

description.name: 100 1st St
description.location: Sun Terrace is on second floor above adjoining parking garage SE of main building. Ground level arcade is on Mission Street side.
description.source: SPUR, DT Plan 2009, Motion
description.description: The large Sun Terrace features extensive landscaping and seating. Several art sculptures are featured, along with an elevated view of the street below. There is a 'grand' staircase (snippet) up to the Sun Terrace. Ground level arcade in front of building

description.name: 200 California St
description.type: Public Sitting Area in Pedestrian Walkway
description.location: In front of building, sidewalk widening
description.source: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
description.description: This pedestrian seating area is on a widened sidewalk. Pedestrians may sit on linear seating that forms a planter box. There is a small, public sculpture next to the planter box.

description.name: 49 Stevenson St
description.location: In front of building on Stevenson Street and through a pedestrianized alley to Jessie Street
description.source: SPUR
description.description: This pedestrian walkway has small fountains and an art sculpture are featured in this space. Plaza seating is available for patrons of Yank Sing restaurant only.

description.name: Marathon Plaza
description.location: In front of building facing Second Street
description.source: SPUR
description.description: Large, triangular urban garden facing Second Street with a water feature, ample seating, and lush landscaping. Deli and restaurant open to the park provide food and additional seating.

description.name: 222 2nd St
description.location: Ground floor lobby
description.source: POPOS Mailing List
description.description: An enclosed open space, with operable floor to ceiling windows and doors; located within the street-level lobby.

description.name: Gap Building
description.location: in front of 2 folsom
description.source: DT Plan 2009, SPUR, POPOS Mailing List
description.description: This is a large plaza with several seating areas. Art sculptures are featured along with diverse landscaping.

description.name: 1 Market St
description.description: Plaza located on Mission Street along the rear of the building. Some planters with benches.

description.name: 71 Stevenson St
description.description: The open space connects Stevenson Street and Jessie Street, including planter boxes, a water fountaing, and seating with table outside the cafe.

description.name: 525 Market St
description.description: This is a two level open space, with granite wall water fountains at the sidewalk level near Market Street and a view to the landscaped space on the second level.

description.name: 14 Fremont St
description.description: This open space is a through walkway between Fremont and 1rst Street that opens into an interior plaza.  A farmers market was operating on location.

description.name: 456 Montomery St
description.description: This is a sunken plaza, landscaped with flowers and small water fountains. Escalators are provided to this space.

description.name: Citygroup Center
description.description: Built with marble, and covered with glass, this greenhouse provides ample seating and tables.

description.name: Spear Street Plaza
description.description: Well landscaped walkway with seating and tables.

description.name: 25 Jessie St
description.description: This urban garden include a water feature combined with a tall art piece. Seating available on the ledeges of raised water feature.

description.name: 201 Spear St
description.description: Plaza with seating along planters.

description.name: 135 Main St
description.description: Interior lobby with seating open business hours only.

description.name: 301 Howard St
description.description: Landscaped seating area located kitty-corner to 301 Howard.

description.name: 444 Market  St
description.description: Plaza with no seating.

description.name: 180 Howard St
description.description: A cul-de-sac walkway with benches at the end.

description.name: 333 Market St
description.description: Open plaza with minimal seating on the edge of planters.

description.name: 595 Market St
description.description: This plaza is located on 2nd. Street and Stevenson. Seating is only available on the steps beyon the table and seating provided for the food establishment.

description.name: 221 Main St
description.description: An open plaza with some seating, landscaping and planters.

description.name: 211 Main St
description.description: Open plaza with two benches and a gated children's play area through to Spear Street.

description.name: 425 Market St
description.description: An open plaza between buildings with benches, trees and some landscape materials.

description.name: Redwood Park
description.description: This extensively landscaped urban park offers redwood trees at the foot of the Transamerica Pyramid. It features, a tall water fountain, sculptures, and ample seating.

description.name: 50 California St
description.description: Plaza and wrap around walkway with seating along planters.

description.name: 100 Pine St
description.description: This Urban Garden is either accessed through the front entrance of the building or a narrow walkway on Front Street. This space offers water fountains, landscaping, and art.

description.name: Golden Gate University
description.description: Concrete seating streches along the passage that connects the recessed entrance of Golden Gate University to the sidewalk on Mission Street.

description.name: 1 California St
description.description: Wrap around plaza area with seating near food services.

description.name: 77 Beale St
description.description: Plaza with high planters that provide some landscaping but no seating.

description.name: 1 Post St
description.description: Snippets surrounding the hexagonal fence of Montgomery Bart Station sunken plaza. This space include concrete steps with some planter boxes.

description.name: 50 Beale St
description.description: Large well landscaped plaza with many seating options.

description.name: 555/557 Market St
description.description: Extensive landscaping combined with water features signify this space between two high rises. Seating,however, is only availabe to employees.

description.name: 650 California St
description.description: This open space is elevated with the street slope. A large art piece represents one entrance to the open space on California Street. This space surrounds the building and offers seating on the ledges of planter boxes.

description.name: 611 Folsom St
description.description: Brick plaza with some trees, artwork and seating on brick structures.

description.name: 201 Mission St
description.description: Initially hidden from street view there is seating along the building setback area to the right as you walk toward the door.

description.name: 1 Bush Street
description.description: This Urban Garden provides a sunken space featuring a water fountain. Space is accessed with stairs from Bush Street and curved walkways from Market street.

description.name: 505-525 Howard
description.description: Street-level outdoor plaza and "indoor park" with seating and a café.

description.name: 535 Mission
description.description: Pedestrian-only alleyway connecting Mission and Minna Streets.
